content.p: Our events give you the opportunity to meet employers, develop your skills, gain an insight into work experience, and explore graduate careers. These events are exclusive to University of Nottingham students and graduates, and are completely free to attend. If you want to search for an event by a keyword or topic, log in to MyCareer. Explore careers areas from what jobs involve to how to apply including Spotlight On events Join presentations from employers with graduate and internship vacancies Talk to multiple employers about their internships and graduate opportunities Find vacancies and ace the recruitment process for jobs and courses Discover how you can gain experience and make a successful application Sessions on choosing your career, further study, the NAA and more Follow us on Instagram telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
